entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:06 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
